duties_responsibilities.duty: Accurately record all necessary meeting details (date, time, locations, file symbol, recurrences, catering, set-up, AV, etc.) into scheduling software.
Immediate capture and communicate all service changes, additions, cancellations to appropriate local support staff firm-wide.
Serve as local office CS subject matter expert- provide consultation on meeting & event space, such as ideal uses, limitations, restrictions, requirements, etc.
Special event planning- menu planning, room configuration, décor, logistical timelines, oversee and participate in execution when needed.
Deal directly with on-site and outside vendors, negotiate pricing, coordinate and oversee delivery of products and services.
Perform routine quality of service checks on all local conference rooms and visitor offices, set up and restock according to respective checklists.
Keep CS Management informed of any potential issues, upcoming events, customer feedback, etc. Provide possible solutions and suggestions.
Perform other work-related duties as assigned by the CS management team.

education_certification.credential: Associate or bachelor's degree or the equivalent with a minimum of two years of related work experience
